metadata.source: Sprint 1 biomarker correlation analysis (mock data verification)
metadata.note: This mapping is based on mock data verification. Real mapping will be created after Sprint 1 real data analysis completes.

ddr.name: DNA Damage Response
ddr.description: Homologous recombination, NHEJ, base excision repair. Features associated with platinum sensitivity.
ddr.evidence: Top features from mock data verification (Sprint 1). Strong positive correlation with sensitive outcome. Real mapping pending real data analysis.
ddr.biological_plausibility: High - DDR deficiency (BRCA1/2, HRD) predicts platinum sensitivity in ovarian cancer

mapk.name: MAPK/RAS Signaling
mapk.description: RAS→RAF→MEK→ERK cascade, oncogenic signaling. Features associated with platinum resistance.
mapk.evidence: Top features from mock data verification (Sprint 1). Strong negative correlation (higher in resistant/refractory). Real mapping pending real data analysis.
mapk.biological_plausibility: High - MAPK activation (KRAS, BRAF) associated with platinum resistance in ovarian cancer

io.name: Immune/Inflammatory
io.description: Immune checkpoint, T-cell infiltration, cytokine signaling. Features with moderate correlation to outcome.
io.evidence: Top features from mock data verification (Sprint 1). Moderate positive correlation. Real mapping pending real data analysis.
io.biological_plausibility: Medium - Immune signatures (MSI-H, TMB) can predict IO response, but relationship to platinum is complex

pi3k_akt.name: PI3K/AKT/mTOR
pi3k_akt.evidence: To be determined from Sprint 1 real data analysis
pi3k_akt.biological_plausibility: Medium - PI3K/AKT activation can drive resistance, but specific SAE features not yet identified

tp53.name: TP53 Pathway
tp53.evidence: To be determined from Sprint 1 real data analysis
tp53.biological_plausibility: High - TP53 mutations are common in ovarian cancer, but specific SAE features not yet identified

next_steps: Run Sprint 1 biomarker analysis on real TCGA-OV SAE features
Update mapping with real top features
